text: Klara Marinova (Клара Маринова; 20 April 1949 – 3 March 2021) was a Bulgarian journalist and politician. She was a member of the Bulgarian Socialist Party. She was a member of the National Assembly from 1990 until 1997. Marinova died on 3 March 2021, aged 71. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Bulgarian politicians Category:Journalists
title: Klara Marinova
